def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = set()
    for config in getsets(idxs, 3):
        for x, y, z in permutations(config):
            check_x_dark_grey = is_dark(x, ctx) and is_grey(x, ctx)
            check_x_bottom_left = is_bottom(x, None, ctx) and is_left(x, None, ctx)
            check_y_dark = is_dark(y, ctx)
            check_y_top_left = is_top(y, None, ctx) and is_left(y, None, ctx)
            check_z_dark_grey = is_dark(z, ctx) and is_grey(z, ctx)
            check_z_right_center = is_right(z, None, ctx) and is_middle(z, None, ctx)
            check_z_smaller = is_smaller(z, x, ctx) and is_smaller(z, y, ctx)
            if (
                check_x_dark_grey
                and check_x_bottom_left
                and check_y_dark
                and check_y_top_left
                and check_z_dark_grey
                and check_z_right_center
                and check_z_smaller
            ):
                results.add(frozenset([x, y, z]))
    return results
state = turn(state)
